products.title: Vitra Blackout Ecru Roller Blind
products.description: Their vitra blackout ecru fabric is a chic light greay, cream shade, it's cool and contemporary and will work beautifully within the home. This shade will work beautifully with natural wooden tones, it is soft and delicate and will provide the perfect finishing touch. Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Biscotti Roller Blind
products.description: Give your home a modern makeover with the crisp and pared back style of the vitra blackout biscotti roller blind. This neutral window blind is created from softly textured fabric with blackout properties to provide solace when required. The creamy biscuit tone is pale yet warm and will beautifully coordinate with a range of interior styles.
